Sentencas: At Forschungszentrum Julich GmbH, a multi-component SOFC design based on planar stacks has been developed, in which all hot system components are scaled to a nominal SOFC stack power of 5 kW. To optimize the SOFC system it is necessary to investigate the effects of design and operating parameters on the system components like pre-reformer and afterburner.
Titulo: Operational behavior and reforming kinetics over Ni/YSZ of a planar type pre-reformer for SOFC systems

Sentencas: A special designed 5-layer planar type steam pre-reformer on basis of Ni/YSZ has been built and tested for operational behavior and kinetics of steam reforming with methane.
Titulo: Operational behavior and reforming kinetics over Ni/YSZ of a planar type pre-reformer for SOFC systems

Sentencas: This paper summarizes and discusses the experimental results on the global reaction kinetics of a Julich planar pre-reformer in the temperature range between 350 degrees C and 620 degrees C at ambient pressure (1 bar).
Titulo: Operational behavior and reforming kinetics over Ni/YSZ of a planar type pre-reformer for SOFC systems

Sentencas: The species compositions of product gas at different feed compositions, flow rates and temperatures are determined by using gas-chromatographic methods and dew-point measurements.
Titulo: Operational behavior and reforming kinetics over Ni/YSZ of a planar type pre-reformer for SOFC systems

Sentencas: The reproducibility of experiments in the low temperature range (especially less than 430 degrees C) was only assured, when the catalyst has been reduced before every kinetic experiment.
Titulo: Operational behavior and reforming kinetics over Ni/YSZ of a planar type pre-reformer for SOFC systems

Sentencas: The proposed kinetic expression of Arrhenius type (second order with respect to mole fraction of methane and first order with respect to mole fraction of water) gives a good agreement with the experimental results of the methane steam reforming.
Titulo: Operational behavior and reforming kinetics over Ni/YSZ of a planar type pre-reformer for SOFC systems

Sentencas: It is general effective for different steam to carbon ratios.
Titulo: Operational behavior and reforming kinetics over Ni/YSZ of a planar type pre-reformer for SOFC systems

Sentencas: The temperature distribution in the pre-reformer and the loss of heat are also discussed.
Titulo: Operational behavior and reforming kinetics over Ni/YSZ of a planar type pre-reformer for SOFC systems
